channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
channel.description:
# **[color=amber]The Cook - Neutral Killing[/color]**
**Passive Ability:** Immune to Conversion
**Day Ability: Feed (4 uses)** Feed the King and his guards will be forced to protect you tonight.
**Night Ability 1: Spoiled** Serve a plate of rotten meat to somebody at night. They will die in 1 day, from food poisoning.
**Night Ability 2: Cook (1 use)** Serve food to the members of court. In 4 days, everybody that is night immune will die unless you are killed.
**Goal:** Win with Surviving Neutrals
**Lore:**
Page from the diary of The Cook-
_"I spent years serving the King and the court. Pork leg here, chicken breast there. All of it was cooked to perfection but does the cook get any thanks? No. All they do is scoff it down like pigs. Even the Princess eats like a pig. Castle Adiart doesn't deserve such luxury._
_I'm going to do it. I'm going to kill them all. Over the weeks, I've saved meat that I'm going to mix in with a big feast. Maybe even serve it to them at night. Hell, they're too tired to even think about what goes in there mouth at night._
_I'm sick and tired of the King and feeding his royal *scribble* backside. Castle Adiart will perish."_

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I forgot I said that

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

no one said you should?

RopeStringFace:

And perhaps “spoiled” should be renamed something to do with nightshade.

What’s that?

RopeStringFace:

So everyone dies, or every one who has immunity to death at night dies?

Anyone with Occupy immunity
BD with Conversion immunity
Anyone with Death immunity

Leaves only few people. Cook isn’t Night Immune (for some reason I feel it’d be stronger to not be Night immune with his abilities)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

And perhaps “spoiled” should be renamed something to do with nightshade.

ThePlex:

I’m not renaming Spoiled.

RopeStringFace:

no one said you should?

why u lyin boi

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

I was going to say “Anyone with a night immunity will die.” - as a way of saying “Bypassing their immune system” - going with germs etc.

So everyone dies, or every one who has immunity to death at night dies?

ThePlex:

And no, I’m not renaming Spoiled.

no one said you should?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

Incentive for blue dragon to keep you alive? Nope.

I like your idea of killing all royals instead, makes more sense because royals would feel more entitled.

It’s not really an incentive. I never specified it because I wasn’t ever finished with this.

I was going to say “Anyone with a night immunity will die.” - as a way of saying “Bypassing their immune system” - going with germs etc.

And no, I’m not renaming Spoiled. Because rotten food can kill a person - rotten fool = spoiled

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
And perhaps “spoiled” should be renamed something to do with nightshade.

Read full topic

item.description:
ThePlex:

Serve food to the members of court. In 4 days, everybody that is night immune will die unless you are killed.

Incentive for blue dragon to keep you alive? Nope.

I like your idea of killing all royals instead, makes more sense because royals would feel more entitled.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
That’s a lie I just asked how many does Spoil has 'cause it wasn’t mentioned xD

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Tryphon made me do it! (reverting back to unlimited spoils)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I’m not entirely sure about the Cook ability… I’m not 100% sure if it’s even good overall…

“Night Immunes” - I was thinking “Any Royal Blood” or something, or just “Half of the court” I don’t know >.<

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
The Cook ability is bad. Takes too much time. Also, how many uses does Spoiled have?

Read full topic
